title: Nuns on the Run Divx&VDubRestoreBy RUBrToe.avi
description:
full IMDB link: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0100280/
production notes: I downloaded this and restored it using Avery Lee&#039;s free program viurtual Dub and it&#039;s embedded filters. The original was too hazy, a little unfocused and the colors were washed out. I restored color vividness and clarity. the result is very good.

This movie has a shower scene with the guys as "nuns" with some really bodacious, un-nun-looking hotty nuns.
